name: Tipsy Barrel Bandit!
description:
You have become a real Boyrrel! 
Sadly, due to company policies, all living real boyrrels are shot on sight. Avoid running out of liquid and escape the factory alive.

Game Overview:
Tipsy Barrel Bandit! is a 2D platformer. You play a living barrel trying to escape the factory from where you were turned alive. 
You lose liquid getting hit by bullets creating leaking holes in the barrel. Losing liquid increases movement speed and jump distance. You can refill your barrel by gathering other substances.

Controls:
- Move Left: A.
- Move Right:  D.
- Jump: SPACE.
- Use Drain: S.
- Shoot: Left Mouse Button.

Winning condition: Complete all levels.
Losing condition:  Running out of liquid.

Team - Headless Hobo:

This is a game jam game, please go easy on us.
